name: Maid Slaves & Golden Dungeon
description:
"Maid Slaves & Golden Dungeon" is a short adult Roguelite game developed by nikukyu and published by 072 Project.



By chance, the general who was captured became a prisoner of war in the enemy country.
I also obtained the slave rights of her and made her a maid, but we have a bad relationship.

I really miss the time when I lived in poverty and worried about my future life alone...

Her cold expression back then has become much softer now,
While saying, ""Master, when do you wake up? You said you wanted to go to the dungeon today, right?""

And she woke me up with a "blow".

A few years after that terrible encounter, today, I go to the dungeon to earn money with the former general who now is my maid!






  • No troublesome mechanics

No need to repeatedly fight monsters to level up.
You can even escape from monsters if you don't want to fight!
Just enhance your weapons to increase your stats,
and gain powerful skills at the same time!!

  • Roguelite dungeon design

Randomly generated maps
Both resources and treasures are randomly generated,
every time you enter the dungeon, you have a different experience.

  • Unique hunger and thirst system

A rare hunger and thirst system in RPGs
Before entering the dungeon, you need to check if you have enough food and water,
Otherwise, you might starve to death in the dungeon!!


Once you come to your senses, you will live a happy and sex life with your maid.
But in order to free Leia, you must find a way to earn 1 million in this 60 floors dungeon!!

While exploring the dungeon, in addition to fighting monsters and gathering resources, you also need to be careful of your hunger and thirst with Ria.
One careless mistake and you might have to start exploring from the first level again.
When you gather the equipment, you can collect valuable resources in deeper levels.

While you are working hard to earn money, there may be various "rewards" waiting for you?!




  • Skip the story
  • Fullscreen mode
  • Key settings / joystick settings
  • Hide dialogue box
  • Scene recollection
  • CG recollection
  • Hunger value / Thirst value
  • Random dungeon
  • Weapon enhancement
